name: Kill WIll Vol.1
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Attack with left-mouseButton (hold it down, to charge up the attack)

Block with right-mouseButton (block at the right time to conter and kill the enemy)

Jump with space

This game is a hommage to one of the best movies ever produced, "Kill Bill" by  Quentin Tarantino (Arguably the best filmmaker of our century).

Enjoy ;D
